messages.subject: Old Football issue from summer
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I wanted to update on something that I had posted a couple months ago. Some may remember that I wrote about my son leaving football because the
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

I wanted to update on something that I had posted a couple months ago.
Some may remember that I wrote about my son leaving football because the
couches where swearing and yelling at the kids. He did quit and has been happy he
left.

Tonight I was shopping and ran into a Mom who had a child on the team. Her
son also quit which is something they didn't allow their older son to do two
years ago.

To make to story short she told me that the coach was asked to leave due to
his cursing at the kids!!

I just wanted to say thank you to all who commented on my posts it was good
to know others where thinking as I was.

We have been holding the gear until the end of the season and had planned on
requesting our funds back. In light of this new information I will be holding
firm on my decision.

Laura


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
